name: Mace of the Sun
description: A powerful mace infused with the essence of the sun. It radiates intense heat and light.
looks: The mace is made of golden metal, with intricate carvings of sun motifs along its shaft. The head of the mace is shaped like a blazing sun, with rays of light extending outwards.

special_weapon_skills.mace: Increases the effectiveness of mace-based attacks.

special_effects.burning: Has a chance to set enemies on fire, dealing additional fire damage over time.

name: Iron Sword
description: A basic sword made from iron.
looks: The iron sword has a long, straight blade with a slightly curved edge. The hilt is made of wood with a simple crossguard.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: Heavy steel gauntlets that provide excellent protection for the hands and fingers.
looks: The gauntlets are made of polished steel with intricate engravings. They cover the entire hand and extend up to the forearm, with separate plates for each finger.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: A pair of steel gauntlets that provide protection for the hands and wrists.
looks: The gauntlets are made of solid steel plates with leather straps for a secure fit. They have reinforced knuckles and a smooth surface.

name: Steel Chestplate
description: A heavy and durable chestplate made from steel.
looks: The steel chestplate is a sturdy piece of armor that covers the chest and upper torso. It is made from polished steel with intricate engravings and has solid metal plates that overlap for added protection.

name: Mage Staff
description: A powerful staff imbued with arcane energy, capable of channeling and amplifying spells.
looks: The Mage Staff is made of polished oak wood, intricately carved with symbols and runes. At the top, a crystal orb glows with a pulsating light, radiating magical energy.

special_effects.spell_amplification: Increases the power of spells cast while wielding the staff.

special_weapon_skils.spellcasting: Grants proficiency in spellcasting while wielding the staff.

name: Iron Sword
description: A basic iron sword for melee combat.
looks: The iron sword has a silver blade with a simple crossguard and a leather-wrapped hilt. It is a standard length for a one-handed sword.

special_effects.bleed: Has a chance to cause the target to bleed, causing additional damage over time.

name: Silver Ring
description: A delicate silver ring adorned with intricate patterns.
looks: The silver ring is made of pure silver and has a slim band. It is decorated with delicate engravings of flowers and vines.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sturdy sword made of steel
looks: The steel sword has a polished blade with a sharp cutting edge. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a firm grip.

name: Magic Wand
description: A wand infused with magical energies, used by spellcasters to channel their powers.
looks: The magic wand is made of polished wood and adorned with intricate carvings and gemstones. It is about 14 inches long and has a tapered end.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Steel Sword
description: A solid steel sword forged with great craftsmanship.
looks: The steel sword has a straight, double-edged blade with a sharp point. The hilt is wrapped in black leather and the pommel is adorned with a polished steel knob.

special_weapon_skils.sword_fighting: Grants a bonus to Sword Fighting skill when wielded.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sturdy sword made from high-quality steel.
looks: The steel sword has a straight blade with a single edge and a pointed tip. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a firm grip.

special_weapon_skills.sword_fighting: Grants a bonus to Sword Fighting skill when wielded.

name: Mighty Battleaxe
description: A large and heavy battleaxe, capable of dealing devastating blows to enemies.
looks: The battleaxe is made of dark steel and has a large, double-edged blade. It has a long wooden handle with metal reinforcements and a pommel at the end.

special_weapon_skills.Axe Mastery: Increases damage and accuracy when using axes.
